import React, { useState } from 'react' import './' const Login = () => { const [userField, setUserField] = useState({ email: '', password: '', confirm_password: '', }) function handleForm(e) { const { name, value } = e.target setUserField(prevState => { return { ...prevState, [name]: value } }) } console.log(userField); return (
) } export default Login
